full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS BLUD RDZONGS BSDUS PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES BRJOD CING THAL MO BRDAB, BLUNG RDZAS SOGS MA LUS PA GNOD PA'I PHYOGS SU BSKYAL, ,BZLOG PA'I MTSAMS GCOD BYED CING, ,RJES CHOG DKYUS BZHIN BYED, THABS DANG RTEN 'BREL LA BRTEN PA'I, ,BLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG BLUD SBYIN 'DI, ,KOO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, ,RANG GI NYE 'KHOR SLOB BU NI, ,BLO LDAN RIG GROL LA SOGS PAS, ,BSKUL PHYIR 'DOD LTAR CHOS KYI YIS, ,THA SHAL BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, ,SNGON MED SER BU'I @005A *, ,SGRA DBYANGS KYI, ,LEGS BSHAD BCOL CHUNG 'DI SGRAGS PA'I, ,DGE BAS MA GYUR SEMS CAN RNAMS, ,BLO BUR RKYEN DANG 'BRAL GYUR CIG ,'DI LA MKHAS RNAMS THUGS MA KHREL` `BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR RGYAN DU BYON, ,'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI, ,AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO,, ,,)
